backend/main.mo: Defines the Motoko backend actor with product, category, carousel, orders, inquiries, and user profile types plus in-memory maps for storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files describing their functionality, routes, components, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles and light/dark theme CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration with lazy-loaded pages, layout, profile setup modal logic, and route definitions including admin and category edit routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/CarouselMa: Admin tool to upload, reorder, edit, and toggle carousel slides with image optimization and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryCa: Manages category-specific carousel images and redirect URLs, supporting image uploads, reordering, and saving updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryIm: Component for uploading, ordering, removing, and selecting a primary image for category image sets with optimization support.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryMan: Admin interface that lists customer inquiries and allows sending responses with status updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Admin interface for viewing orders, updating statuses, formatting data, and printing order details.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Modal form for creating or editing products, including media upload, optimization, and category selection.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Displays product inventory with options to add, edit, or delete products using a modal and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Form-based admin tool for editing static site content such as contact info, policies, and About Us text.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCarousel: Carousel component fetching category slides, filtering enabled slides, auto-rotating, and supporting navigation with image click redirects.
frontend/src/components/CategoryImageCar: Renders an auto-rotating category image carousel with hover pause, navigation controls, and optional redirect.
frontend/src/components/checkout/CouponC: Checkout component for applying and removing coupon codes with inline validation and messaging.
frontend/src/components/checkout/UpiQrCo: Renders a UPI payment QR code and provides a copy-to-clipboard action for the UPI link.
frontend/src/components/CustomerPageStyl: Wraps children in a div used to scope customer page styling.
frontend/src/components/footer/FooterSys: Renders the site footer with contact info, policies, dynamic site content, and a branded bottom bar.
frontend/src/components/HomeCarousel.tsx: Displays a home-page autoplaying slide carousel with sorting, transitions, hover pause, and click redirects.
frontend/src/components/HomeCategoryCaro: Shows a section of category descriptions and two image carousels for each product category.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with header navigation, authentication controls, cart indicator, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/OrderDetailModal: Modal for viewing order details, status, and submitting cancellation requests with reason selection.
frontend/src/components/ProductMediaCaro: Displays product media (video and images) in a navigable square-aspect carousel with arrows.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form that collects user profile fields, saves them through an actor, and triggers query invalidation and success toasts.
frontend/src/components/RouteLoadingFall: Displays skeleton placeholders as a loading fallback for lazy‑loaded routes.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Empty placeholder file for a Stripe setup modal component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUiBodyAttribu: Adds and removes a data-admin-ui attribute on the body to enable admin‑scoped styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Provides a persistent Zustand-powered shopping cart with item management and total calculations.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategoryCarouselQu: Defines queries and mutations for reading and updating category carousel images and redirect URLs using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useFooterVariant.ts: Returns a fixed footer variant value of 'split'.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication state, login, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains react‑query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, categories, and carousel slide CRUD via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and custom design tokens, colors, utilities, and component styles for the site.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin page for viewing, filtering, and updating order statuses with date and month/year filters.
frontend/src/pages/admin/CategoryEditPag: Admin page for editing category details, images, and saving updates via API.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard showing stats and management tabs for products, orders, inquiries, site content, and categories, with access restrictions for non-admins.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays and manages the user's shopping cart with item quantity controls, pricing, and authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/categories/AnkletsPag: Empty category page placeholder for anklets.
frontend/src/pages/categories/BridalJewe: Empty category page placeholder for bridal jewellery.
frontend/src/pages/categories/CategoryNo: Empty component placeholder for category-not-found UI.
frontend/src/pages/categories/CategoryPa: Template for category pages that loads products, filters by category, and provides cart and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/categories/EarringsPa: Empty category page placeholder for earrings.
frontend/src/pages/categories/LabGrownDi: Renders the lab-grown diamonds category using the shared template.
frontend/src/pages/categories/NecklacePa: Empty category page placeholder for necklaces.
Empty category page placeholder for rings.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles the checkout flow including address entry, coupon application, UPI payment handling, and final order creation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form for authenticated users to submit inquiries to the store, with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboardPage: Shows authenticated customers their orders and inquiries with status details and an order detail modal.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays homepage with hero carousel, category sections, and product grid with add-to-cart and buy-now actions.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Shows authenticated users their order history with statuses, product lookup, and a modal for order details.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Empty page placeholder with no implemented UI or logic.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Renders a success message after payment with next steps and navigation to orders or home.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCategoryPage.t: Lists products filtered by category slug, handling invalid categories, cart actions, and product navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product information with media carousel, price, stock, quantity selection, and cart/buy actions.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileDetailsPage.ts: Provides a profile editing form for authenticated users with validation and save functionality.
frontend/src/utils/device.ts: Utility to detect mobile devices using userAgentData with a fallback to userAgent regex.
frontend/src/utils/mediaOptimization.ts: Client-side utilities to resize, compress, and preview images and videos before upload.
frontend/src/utils/pricing.ts: Pricing utilities for subtotal, discounts, coupon validation, and currency formatting.
frontend/src/utils/productCategories.ts: Defines product categories and helpers for lookup and generating options.
frontend/src/utils/upi.ts: Generates UPI, Google Pay, and PhonePe payment deep links from amount and payee details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash. Also includes utilities for retrieving and removing stored session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with dark mode, content paths, extended color palette, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, feature scope, constraints, and known issues. Tracks implemented features and pending requests for admin and customer UI updates.
